description: [Micro Missiles] deal 25% increased damage and knockback.

description: Increase [Helix Rocket] explosion radius by 40% and explosion damage by 15%.

name: Dreamy

description: Gain 1 extra charge of [Soundwave].

description: [Biotic Orb] launches 2 additional orbs of the chosen type with 85% reduced effectiveness.

name: Cybernetic Speed
description: Dealing damage with [Shuriken] grants 2% [Shuriken] Attack Speed for 3s, stacking up to 15%.

description: Jumping while mid-air creates a large [Ice Wall] pillar under you (12s Cooldown).

name: Just Roll With It

name: Hot Potato

description: [Carnage] gains an additional charge but its cooldown reduction per hit is reduced to 1s.

name: Thrill of Battle
description: [Adrenaline Rush] also heals allies within 12m for 50% of the amount it heals you.

name: No Limits

description: [Rampage] and [Carnage] give 15% of Max Life as Overhealth per hit.

description: Hits with [Quick Melee] mark enemies for 5s. Allies gain 20% Lifesteal against marked enemies.

name: Triage Unit
description: When using [Guardian Angel] on allies below 50% Life, [Caduceus Staff] heals them 30% more for 3s.

name: Twice as Ice
description: When you use [Cryo-Freeze], reset the next cooldown of [Ice Wall].

name: Frost Armor
description: Gain Armor equal to 5% of the primary fire damage you deal, up to 100, until the end of the round.

name: Snowball
description: [Endothermic Blaster]’s secondary fire now shoots a snowball that applies 30% slow for 1s on critical hit.

name: Quick Draw
description: After using [Combat Roll], [Peacekeeper]’s next primary fire can auto-aim within 9m under 2s cooldown.

name: Triple Threat
description: After using [Swift Step], for 4s, your secondary fire throws 2 additional [Kunai] in a spread that deals 50% less damage.

name: Peripheral Pulse
description: During [Tactical Visor], [Pulse Rifle] shots at 1 additional enemy, dealing 50% damage.

name: FaceTanking
description: [Defense Matrix] heals you for 30% of the damage it blocks.

name: Major Flex
description: [Barrier] knocks back and deals 25 damage, increased by [Energy], to enemies within 5m every 1s.

display_metadata.rich_description: [Barrier] knocks back and deals {ap_value} damage, increased by [Energy], to enemies within 5m every 1s.

name: Your Full Potential
description: [Nano Boost] also grants the target 20% Ultimate Charge and 200 Overhealth.

display_metadata.rich_description: [Nano Boost] also grants the target {uc_value} Ultimate Charge and {ap_value} Overhealth.

name: Iridescent Iris
description: 20% Ability Power; 10% Cooldown Reduction; After spending your Ultimate Charge, gain 100 Overhealth for 3s.

name: Charged Plating
description: After you spend your Ultimate Charge, gain 25 Armor and 10% Ability Power for the rest of the round.

name: Reckoner’s Roar
description: Using [Commanding Shout] [Wounds] enemies within 10m for 30 damage over 3s.

display_metadata.rich_description: Using [Commanding Shout] [Wounds] enemies within 10m for {ap_value} damage over 3s.

name: Teamwork Toolkit
description: 10% Weapon Power (Healing Ofuda, Kunai). When you heal an ally, grant them 10% Move Speed for 3s.

name: Our Bikes
description: 25 Health. 15% Ability Power. Allies affected by [Kitsune Rush] are healed for 80 every 1s.

name: Wretched Wings
description: 25 Health. While using [Wraith Form], gain the ability to fly and gain 20% Move Speed.

name: Asa’s Armaments
description: 10% Attack Speed. [Kunai] bounce off surfaces 1 time.

name: Lofly Beats
description: 5% Weapon Power (Sonic Amplifier). 5% Ability Power (Crossfade, Amp It Up, Soundwave, Sound Barrier). While in [Speed Boost], [Soundwave] knocks you back.

name: Elite Rotator Cuff
description: 10% Ability Power. 35% [Javelin Spin] Duration.

name: Thick Skull
description: 50 Armor. While casting [Rampage] or [Carnage], gain 50% Damage Reduction.

name: Maxed Mag
description: 5% Attack Speed. Gain 3% Attack Speed for each remaining Ammo above 50% of your Max Ammo.

name: Overclocked Barrier
description: 25 Health. 20% [Barrier Field] Health. 20% [Barrier Field] Size.

name: Crusader’s Cure
description: 25 Health. Using [Charge] cleanses all negative effects.

name: Neverfrost
description: 25 Health. 5% Weapon Power. Reduce effectiveness of enemy slows by 50%.

name: Optimized Energy
description: 10% Weapon Power (Augmented Fusion Driver). Critical Hits reduce your [Heat] by 5%.

name: Swift-Loader
description: 10% Attack Speed (Dragonblade, Shuriken). 30% Max Ammo (Shuriken). Damaging an enemy with [Swift Strike] restores 20% of your ammo.

name: Shady Spectacles
description: 10% Ability Lifesteal

name: Energized Bracers
description: 10% Ability Power; 10% Ability Lifesteal

name: Celestial Clip
description: 10% Weapon Power (Caduceus Staff, Caduceus Blaster). 33% Max Ammo (Caduceus Blaster). [Caduceus Blaster] has a 10% chance to fire an extra shot that doesn’t consume ammo.

name: Quickload Chamber
description: 20% Reload Speed (Peacekeeper). Reloading within 6m of an enemy adds 20% of Max Ammo as extra Ammo.

name: Bio-Needles
description: 10% Attack Speed. [Biotic Grasp]’s secondary fire restores 50% more [Biotic Energy].

name: Infrared Lenses
description: 15% Ability Power (Coach Gun, B.O.B., Dynamite). Deal 20% increased damage to Burning enemies.

name: Factory Reset
description: While [Fortify] is active, [Javelin Spin] and [Energy Javelin] gain 25% Cooldown Reduction.

name: Particle Accelerator
description: Gain 15% Attack Speed for [Particle Cannon]’s secondary fire. After using an ability, quadruple this bonus for 5s.

name: Bloodbound
description: 50 Health; The last enemy to deal a final blow to you is revealed when nearby. Deal 10% more damage to them and take 10% reduced damage from them.

name: Coalegion
description: 25 Health. 15% Ability Power (Biotic Orb, Coalescence). Allies healed by [Coalescence] deal 15% increased damage.

name: Equilibrium Gear
description: 25 Health. While climbing, heal 5% of your Life every 1s.

name: Chimera’s Maw
description: 5% Ability Power. 50% [Fire Strike] Radius.
